verse.lines:
Jesus Jesus
Holy and Anointed One
Jesus

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Jesus Jesus
Risen and Exalted One
Jesus

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Your name is like honey on my lips
Your Spirit like water to my soul
Your Word is a lamp unto my feet
Jesus I love You I love You
